title: The Dreamstone
description: When Parker’s mom is dreamnapped by the wicked Mab, it is up to him and Kaelyn to save her. When they return to Dreams, they discover Mab isn’t their only problem. Gladamyr has lost his powers and the only way to get them back is to become what he fears the most—a nightmare.“The Dreamstone, is a wild stallion of a story: fast, thrilling, and unpredictable. If this one isn’t a kid-pleaser, I don’t know what is.” —Michelle Isenhoff, author of the Divided Decade Trilogy and the Taylor Davis Series.
author: Mikey Brooks
